::Epyon/Skyburst/Prowl/Hot Rod::

"Ok, let me gets some guys together," said Epyon. He then noticed that
Skyburst was back.
"Hey Skyburst want to enter a little wrestling match for fun?"

"Sure, sounds cool," answers Skyburst.

Then Prowl runs by, putting ?????? in a cell, which was close to the med
bay. He then came back.

"Prowl, you interested in a little wrestling?" Asked Epyon.

"I guess I'll give it a go, sure," answers the Maximal Commander.

"Ok, we need one more..."
Epyon activates his comm unit.
"Hot Rod, want to have a little wrestling match in the holodeck?"

Hot Rod gets the message, and responds, "Ok, I'm on my way."
Hot Rod turns to Goth and Ghost. 
"Well come on in. Look around, meet some of the guys, and femmes if you
know what I mean. I'm gonna go do this wrestling thing."
Hot Rod makes his way to where the others are located.

"Hot Rod, can we use the one wrestling ring holodeck program you made?"
Questioned Epyon.

"Yeah sure, I'll get it running."
He walks to the nearest computer panel and uplinks to the holodeck
system.
"Computer, run program: HotRodWWF85."

In the holodeck things start to appear. First a black frame of a ring,
followed by the mat and canvas. Then black pads on the floor, and black
World Wrestling Federation ring aprons. Then two black steel steps
appeared in opposite cornors. Then black WWF turnbuckle pads. And
finally red ring ropes.

Hot Rod then turns back to the others.
"It's all setup. We can go whenever your ready, the holodeck is the best
place for this."

OOC: Sorry, if I did too much in this post. I just wanted to get things
moving.
